name: Slime Roundup
description:
DESCRIPTION

Slime Roundup is a game based on Puffle Roundup with a really short duration. The game is simple, just catch al the slimes you can!

CONTROLS

Movevement [w] [a] [s] [d]  || Quit game [esc] || Select [MouseButton]

MUSIC

Music by: https://www.steven-obrien.net/ || Calm Latin - Steven O'Brien

REINA 2023
